sentences.sContent: So we do believe we have improved the willingness of our people for our acceptance in the future.
sentences.sContent_eng: So we do believe we have improved the willingness of our people for our acceptance in the future.
sentences.sCn: 因此，我们确实认为，我们已经使群众发生变化，愿意将来接受我们的领导。

sentences.sContent: But when we focus on God and His ability and willingness to help us in every way -- all our excuses become insignificant.
sentences.sContent_eng: But when we focus on God and His ability and willingness to help us in every way -- all our excuses become insignificant.
sentences.sCn: 但是当我们聚焦在神时，他的能力和意愿会用任何方法去帮助我们---我们所有的借口都变得毫无意义。

sentences.sContent: That provides a measure of willingness to punish, even at a cost to the punisher.
sentences.sContent_eng: That provides a measure of willingness to punish, even at a cost to the punisher.
sentences.sCn: 这提供了一个对惩罚的愿意程度的衡量手段，即使惩罚有代价。

synos.tran: 乐意；心甘情愿；自动自发

words.tran: 乐意的；自愿的；心甘情愿的
意志；情感；遗嘱；意图；心愿
决心；用意志力驱使；将（财产等）遗赠某人（will的现在分词）
决心要；遗赠；用意志力使
